project.name: GUI Application
project.desc: A blank GUI application, using PyQt5.\nPlease note: Qt 5 and PyQt5 are required to run this type of project.

file.name: main.py
file.content:
from PyQt5 import QtWidgets, QtGui, QtCore
import sys
Qt = QtCore.Qt

class MainWindow(QtWidgets.QMainWindow):
	def __init__(self, parent=None):
		super(Window, self).__init__(parent)
		## Start coding here!


if __name__ == '__main__':
	global app, window
	app = QtWidgets.QApplication(sys.argv)
	window = MainWindow()
	window.show()
	sys.exit(app.exec_())

project.name: Module
project.desc: A template for a Python module.

file.name: setup.py
file.content: from setuptools import setup\nsetup(name='MNAME',version='VERSIONNUM', description='DESC', url='URL', author='AUTHOR', author_email='AUTHOREMAIL', license='LICENSE', packages=['NAME'], zip_safe=False)
